pageContext.claim: “I have not seen the report. Perhaps he's read the report. I think he [Bill Barr] was quoted incorrectly. I do believe that, because I'm hearing their -- the report is very powerful.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump suggested that Attorney General Bill Barr did not really disagree with the conclusions of a DOJ inspector general report that found no impropriety in the decision to open a counterintelligence investigation into the Trump campaign in 2016. Barr did in fact disagree with the report's conclusions, arguing that the investigation was inappropriately authorized.
